api_password.description: API password for querying Icinga2 for objects

api_url.description: URL to the API stream, e.g. 'https://localhost:5665/v1'

api_user.description: API user name to query Icinga2 host for objects

ca_file.description: Optional path to CA bundle for validating server-side certificate

certificate.description: Path to client certificate if using certificate authentication instead of username/password

key.description: Path to client private key if using certificate authentication instead of username/password
